questions.question: What is the primary function of Microsoft Word?
What is the purpose of the formula bar in Microsoft Excel?
What is the main advantage of using templates in Microsoft PowerPoint?
What is the shortcut key to save a document in Microsoft Word?
What is the purpose of the AutoSum feature in Microsoft Excel?
options: To quickly sum a range of cells

questions.question: How do you insert a new slide in Microsoft PowerPoint?
options: Click on the 'Insert' tab and select 'New Slide'
Click on the 'Home' tab and select 'New Slide'
Right-click on the slide pane and select 'New Slide'

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Track Changes' feature in Microsoft Word?
What is the shortcut key to copy a cell in Microsoft Excel?
How do you insert a table in Microsoft PowerPoint?
options: Click on the 'Insert' tab and select 'Table'
Click on the 'Home' tab and select 'Table'
Right-click on the slide and select 'Table'

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Spell Check' feature in Microsoft Word?
What is the primary function of Microsoft Word?
Which of the following is a feature of Microsoft Excel?
What is the purpose of the 'Normal View' in Microsoft PowerPoint?
options: To view slides in a linear format
To view slides in a slide show format

questions.question: How do you insert a table in Microsoft Word?
What is the function of the 'AutoSum' feature in Microsoft Excel?
options: To automatically sum a range of cells

questions.question: How do you add a new slide to a presentation in Microsoft PowerPoint?
options: Using the 'Home' tab and selecting 'New Slide'
Using the 'Insert' tab and selecting 'New Slide'
Using the 'Slide Show' tab and selecting 'New Slide'
Using the 'Review' tab and selecting 'New Slide'

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Header and Footer' feature in Microsoft Word?
options: To add watermarks to a document
To add page numbers to a document
To add a table of contents to a document
To add a footer to a document

questions.question: How do you format cells in Microsoft Excel to display currency symbols?
options: Using the 'Home' tab and selecting 'Number' and then 'Currency'
Using the 'Format' tab and selecting 'Cells' and then 'Currency'
Using the 'Insert' tab and selecting 'Symbol' and then 'Currency'
Using the 'Review' tab and selecting 'Format' and then 'Currency'

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'Transitions' feature in Microsoft PowerPoint?
options: To add animations to a presentation
To add slide transitions to a presentation
To add sound effects to a presentation
To add videos to a presentation

questions.question: How do you save a document in Microsoft Word as a PDF file?
options: Using the 'File' tab and selecting 'Save As' and then 'PDF'
Using the 'Home' tab and selecting 'Save As' and then 'PDF'
Using the 'Insert' tab and selecting 'Save As' and then 'PDF'
Using the 'Review' tab and selecting 'Save As' and then 'PDF'
